thread.section_title: Citadines Trocadero Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel
thread.title_full: Good hotel - Review of Citadines Trocadero Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ruha K
title: Good hotel
text:
Location was not in the city center but you can reach to every sights in 30mins from hotel not only use a metro. there is very convenient bus line near by. And you can see the eiffel in the balcony even though it's small
Reception was kind they responded or fixed problem immediately when I request
Coffee was provided 24 hours(taste good!!), you can use appliance in the room refrigerator, sink, microwave and It was very helpful save food expense (I recommend get a grocery in franprix in the place victor hugo, the boulangerie next to franprix was exellant! )
During the 7days stay, the time of cleaning service is not being satisfied me, but I can get a towels, amenity as much as I need in 5th floor's room. It was okay.
I would like to rebook this hotel If I visit the paris again
highly recommend this hotel consdering price
한국분들 후기는 거의 없는곳인데 1박당 10만원 초반 가격이라 예약 했어요
위치는 토르카데로 역에서 5분정도 걸리고 생각보다는 좀 작은 호텔입니다
파리에 있는 시타딘 호텔 중에 제일 오래 된 축인거 같은데 그래도 가격대비 매우 만족스러웠어요
체크인 하실때 발코니 룸 가능한지 확인하세요 좋아요
제가 묵을때 난방이 잘 작동이 안되서 이틀째 말했는데 대안으로 휴대용 래디에이터 주셨고 나중에 다른 레디에이터도 고쳐주셨고요 물어보는데 다 성실하게 대답해 주시는데 한분빼고 영어가 뛰어난거 같진 않았어요 클리닝은 토요일에만 해주는거 같고요 (원래 6일에 한번이 원칙이라고 알아요)
시티맵퍼 앱 이용하셔서 트로카데로나 보시에르역 쪽에서 버스도 많이 타는걸 추천드려요
생제르맹이나 샹드마스 공원쪽으로도 갑니다
저는 만족스러운 숙박이었네요
Room Tip: request a balcony room See more room tips
